mapper.insert: insert into ecb_honorcategory (pkid, parentid, name, userid, classid, sortnum, createtime) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ecb_honorcategory set parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, parentid, name, userid, classid, sortnum, createtime from ecb_honorcategory
